form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Central Intelligence Agency Personnel File, G-135a

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/31/2023 Form G-135a Agency Name Check aw (Rev. 1-15-59) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE District Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. 0300 NYC A11 638 538 APP AS P Sub-office Date 1-29-60 DIRECTOR, CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY 2430 E Street, N.W., Washington, D.C. Attention: DEPUTY DIRECTOR, PLANS Please furnish any derogatory information that may be contained in your files concerning the following person. XX NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL August 11, 1915 M Negfo STATUS CAIN, Whitfield Hugh PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state PRESENT NATIONALITY S M & country) la Caiba, Honduras Honduran D W ALIASES (Identify maiden name or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, if known) aka Whitfield Hugh Evan CAIN unknown HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS 5'4" 156 Frn. Black Med. none visible RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 3720 - 108th Street, Corona, L.I., New York 11-59 date PRIOR RESIDENCES, IF AVAILABLE none shown EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Belize Electricity Board Engineer 1940 1959 PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) SPOUSE (Full name & any other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH none-shown Gladys CAIN- 23 Kirkwood Alley, British Honduras PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) HONDURA none FEB 4 1960 NO PERTINFUL LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if (numerous, list years 11-1-59 Miami, Fla. via Airlines as visitor IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION when previously in U.S.) PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit. S/N; passport; socialise curity; FBI; etc., none shown identify each) PREVIOUS REPORTS FURNISHED BY FBI: NO YES If yes attach list of reports. REASON FOR REQUEST APPLICANT FOR: DEPORTATION BENEF. PB #: Other (Specify) PROCEEDINGS ADM. TO U.S. ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF OF NATZ RETURN TO INVESTIGATIONS (3) U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service Assistant Commissioner 119 D St., N.E. CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY Investigations Washington 25, D.C.
